details.title: Pilates Workout at Home
details.description: Pilates is a holistic exercise system that focuses on strengthening the core and enhancing flexibility, balance, and overall body fitness. Pilates exercises effectively activate and strengthen your core muscles and other key areas like the abs, lower back, legs, butt and pelvic floor muscles. Practicing Pilates has many benefits. Similar to yoga, Pilates exercises can not only enhance muscle strength, improve balance/flexibility, and help lose weight, but can also enhance energy, promote relaxation, and even improve sleep quality. 🌟 Strengthen muscles Pilates is highly effective for strengthening muscles, especially the core, through precise and controlled movements that target deep muscles in the abdomen, lower back, and pelvis, promoting overall body toning. 🌟 Lose weight effectively With just a 30-day Pilates plan, you can transform your body into a more toned figure. Pilates is an effective tool for those looking to shed excess pounds. This low-impact exercise engages multiple muscle groups simultaneously, effectively boosting calorie burn. 🌟 Enhance flexibility Worried about your body being too stiff? Through its gentle yet effective movements, Pilates gradually lengthens and stretches muscles, increasing flexibility and range of motion, leaving the body more supple and agile. 🌟 Improve posture & relieve pain By strengthening muscles and promoting alignment, Pilates effectively addresses poor posture, making you look more upright and elegant. Moreover, it can effectively relieve shoulder, neck, and back pain caused by poor posture. 🌟 Boost energy Pilates boosts energy by metabolizing stress hormones, relaxing muscles, and incorporating specialized breathing exercises that enhance circulation throughout the body. Extraordinary experience prepared by Pilates Workout at Home: 💗 Personalized plan just for you Tailored plans designed exclusively for your fitness journey. 💗 Focus on your target areas Targeted exercises for abs, chest, buttocks, legs, arms, and the full body. 💗 Suitable for all levels Various plans and workouts cater to both beginners and experienced enthusiasts. 💗 No equipment needed Whether at home, at work, or outdoors, you can practice Pilates anytime, anywhere. 💗 Expert-designed plans and workouts Ensuring the highest quality and effectiveness in your Pilates routine. 💗 Various workouts to meet all your needs Meet all your fitness needs, allowing you to choose routines that align with your preferences. 💗 Detailed video instructions Guiding you through each exercise, ensuring proper form and technique. 💗 Smart progress tracker Helping to visualize your fitness journey and progress, keeping you motivated. 💗 Daily reminders Keeping you on track, making it easy to maintain a consistent Pilates routine. Take a few minutes each day for self-care, immerse yourself in the world of Pilates! Your body will become leaner, more toned, and healthier, while you'll also experience a more joyful state of mind.

details.title: FDI NEIR
details.description: The Federal Directorate of Immunization (FDI) - National Electronic Immunization Registry (NEIR) is an Android-based application designed to revolutionize vaccination data management and support public health initiatives. This application empowers healthcare professionals to register and record child vaccination data in real time using unique Quick Response (QR) codes. NEIR ensures a server-based, persistent electronic record that facilitates precise tracking of child vaccination coverage and supports disease prevention efforts. Clinical decision support The app includes an electronic decision support system that guides routine and catch-up immunizations, enhancing the efficiency and effectiveness of vaccination efforts. Disease prevention and public health The app supports national immunization campaigns and tracks child vaccination data in real-time using unique QR codes. It maintains comprehensive vaccination records and facilitates precise tracking of child vaccination coverage. Healthcare services and management: The app facilitates vaccinator management, attendance tracking, micro-planning, surveillance forms, and vaccine stock maintenance. It also provides comprehensive reporting, PDF report downloads, and SMS reminders for upcoming immunization visits. Key features of FDI NEIR include: Immunization Campaign and Data Support: Supports national immunization campaigns and data management strategies by maintaining comprehensive vaccination records and providing decision support to health workers. Real-time Data Recording: Allows vaccinators to instantly log vaccination data against unique QR codes, ensuring accurate and up-to-date records. Electronic Decision Support System: Guides routine and catch-up immunizations, enhancing the efficiency and effectiveness of vaccination efforts. Comprehensive Reporting:The web-based dashboard enables the generation of performance-based immunization reports, defaulter reports, population-based coverage reports, and more. Vaccinator Management: Facilitates tracking and attendance of vaccinators, micro-planning, surveillance forms, and vaccine stock maintenance. Offline Functionality: The application also works offline after a successful offline sync completion, ensuring uninterrupted service even without internet connectivity. PDF Reports: Allows vaccinators to download PDF reports for easy access and distribution. Attendance Tracking: Monitors the attendance of vaccinators, ensuring accountability and efficiency. SMS Reminders: Automatically sends reminders to parents about upcoming immunization visits, improving adherence to vaccination schedules. NOTE: This application is exclusively for vaccinators and users of the EPI program with registered user accounts and credentials.

details.title: Losing Weight After Pregnancy
details.description:
After giving birth, you may still have some fat and weight leftover you can get rid of. Burn off excess baby weight with help from a professional fitness trainer.

Losing the baby weight: many women wonder how long it takes to lose baby weight and bounce back to a pre-baby body. While many of us wish we could magically lose all those extra pregnancy pounds the moment baby finally arrives, the fact is no one snaps right back to her pre-baby body so quickly.

Though you may be eager to jump into a workout program or diet, easing into light exercise is crucial for keeping your body safe and injury-free. Even the fittest moms may have trouble getting back to exercise. After all, having a baby is a major ordeal and something you'll need time to recover from. You'll need clearance from your doctor and, depending on what kind of birth you had, it may be 4 to 8 weeks before you can engage in serious exercise.

But getting your body back after having a baby is not as hard as you might think.
Research shows that starting a regular exercise program soon after giving birth is not only good for your overall health, but may also help reduce the risk of postpartum depression.

This workout programs uses pure bodyweight exercises to safely get your body back into exercise after having a baby.  Get your heart rate up for cardio for weight loss, as well as strengthen to tone and tighten your muscles. We added options for all fitness levels.

Getting flatter abs involves losing overall body fat with a combination of cardio, strength training, and a healthy diet. Even then, you may still have a little fat around the lower belly. This is an area many women store excess fat, particularly after pregnancy, so try not to put too much pressure on yourself to get a flat belly.

Learn safe, healthy ways to lose weight after pregnancy and tips for fitting in exercise with your new schedule.

details.title: Postnatal Workouts
details.description:
You've brought your baby home and you're ready to get back to your pre-pregnancy form.

Our workouts are specifically created for new moms looking to build and strengthen their muscles after birth.
These gentle exercises are perfect for easing your postnatal body into an exercise routine.
Following a safe and effective postnatal workout plan will get you on the right track to becoming a happy and healthy new mom.

Getting your body back post-baby isn't easy, but this postpartum exercise app is a great starting point. Postnatal exercise can help with weight loss and psychological wellbeing. It can also hasten recovery, and assist with muscle strength and toning. Postnatal exercises are important for you to regain the strength of your abdominal muscles, after the birth of your baby.

Just because you are a mum does not mean you cannot be fit. Finding time to train however is difficult. If you have to think about carving time to get to the gym, train, get back, shower and still fit in all the demands of being a mother then things become truly challenging.

One way to regain stability and heal pregnancy-related abdominal issues is through postnatal core workouts. 
Postpartum belly fat: we added exercises for a flat belly post pregnancy in just 30 days. You've heard Kegels mentioned from time to time, but just what are these exercises, and what do they do? These invisible exercises strengthen the pelvic floor muscles, and they are great to do both during and after pregnancy. Women who perform Kegel exercises during pregnancy may have an easier time during childbirth because strengthening the pelvic muscles can help a woman control those muscles during labor and delivery

Features :
- Records training progress automatically
- A total of 5 workouts and multiple 30-day challenges
- Create your own workouts
- Increases exercise intensity step by step

Get a stronger core and pelvic floor after baby with this postpartum workout program.

Expecting a baby is a wonderful journey, and this pregnancy tracker app makes it even better with weekly updates about your pregnancy, plus tips for what to expect in these 280 days.

Here’s what you can do with our baby progress app, amma Pregnancy Tracker:

- Keep an eye on your fetal kick count with the baby kick counter

And more!

Every expecting mother wants to know how her baby is growing during pregnancy, how her body is changing, and if she's healthy. With amma Pregnancy Tracker & baby growth app, you’ll find your own detailed weekly pregnancy calendar, information on your baby's development, changes in your body, and tips on nutrition for pregnant women. Here are some of the areas you'll find in your baby center, updated weekly:

Enter data into our in-app baby kicks counter monitor to see trends and have the detailed kick count when you speak to your doctor.

Due date countdown helps prepare for changes and having everything ready before the big day. Use labor contraction tracking when the time has come.

Why not enhance your pregnancy and parenthood with a bit of technology? amma is a digital expectant mother's guide into week-by-week pregnancy calculation, fetal development, contractions and labor. Amma embraces the baby and mom connection and gives you an overview of every important detail. Count the kicks, contractions and more to stay on top of the process.

This maternity app and pregnancy tracker & calculator with a kick counter is not for medical use and does not replace the advice of a trained medical doctor. If you have any concerns about your pregnancy, consult with your doctor or midwife.

details.title: Урология и андрология
details.description:
The Department of Urology of the Volyn Hospital specializes in the fields of traditional urology, andrology, neuro-urology, oncourology, plastic urology, endourology, X-ray urology. The emphasis in the treatment of patients is made on minimally invasive and organ-saving treatment methods. Complex and unique surgeries are performed, such as laparoscopic intestinal ureteroplasty, laparoscopic cystectomy, percutaneous nephrolitholapaxy of coral stones, as well as surgery for oncological diseases. The Medical and Diagnostic Center for Men's Health was created to address a wide range of male urogenital problems, including prostatitis, prostate adenoma, prostate cancer, urolithiasis, varicocele, male infertility, erectile dysfunction and others. Complex treatment: from unique hardware techniques to various endoscopic and minimally invasive surgeries. Hospitalization in the urology department of the Volyn hospital is possible both on a planned and emergency basis.

The Clinical Hospital No. 1 of the Office of the President of the Russian Federation (Volynskaya) is a large medical complex consisting of more than two dozen inpatient departments of a surgical and therapeutic profile, several medical and diagnostic departments, and clinics with more than forty specialized rooms.

details.title: Doctor Learning Games for Kids
details.description: ​​SKIDOS Baby Doctor games for kids is a fun doctor game that helps kids to play hospital games & get fun preschool learning with the help of games. SKIDOS educational games are fun 4 yr old math kids educational games which help them have fun and learn. They can pretend to be an ear doctor, a dentist, or even a surgeon. This way kids get aware of these common illnesses with the help of the baby doctor game for kids by SKIDOS. 💊 Cure the cold Doctor games for kids are preschool learning games for 3,5, and 4-year-olds boys & girls. With baby doctor games, kids can learn when & how to detect colds & use a thermometer. Fun learning games for toddlers are an excellent way to make preschool kids familiar with medical kits. 🦷 Fix your friends’ teeth Is your baby doctor afraid of dentists? Dentist games for kids are helpful in removing their fear of going to the dentist. Kids also learn to brush teeth regularly to avoid germs & cavities. Let kids learn dental hygiene with this dentist game for kids. 🏥 Get an X-ray Baby doctor games allow baby doctors to perform X-rays & fix bones like in a real hospital. Baby Doctor games for kids let your baby doctor take care of the ears of their cute patients. 💢 Treat the wounds This hospital game for 3,4,5-year-old kids involves activities, where they learn how to take care of wounds. 🔢 Learn numbers & learn to count Let your baby doctors learn numbers as they come across integrated learning content designed for preschoolers to learn numbers & simple math in-game. 🧒 Fun preschool learning games Fun learning game tasks such as simple math, coding, & logic building are a part of your kid's journey with SKIDOS Doctor Game for kids. SKIDOS is a universe of fun math educational games for kids with over 30+ learning apps for kids. The learning games are designed for different learning levels: pre-K, kindergarten, preschool, and 1st-5th grade (fun games for 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9 years old boys & girls). details.title: One Drop: Better Health Today
details.description:
One Drop is a free, award-winning app for people living with diabetes, prediabetes, high blood pressure, and high cholesterol. One Drop simplifies staying healthy, so that you can reach your full potential. Track all your health data in one place, join a supportive community, and explore health topics, recipes, and tips.  
 
Join our community of over 1 million people worldwide reimagining what's possible with One Drop. 
 
—
 
FEATURES
 
HEALTH DATA TRACKING
Keep track of blood sugar, medications, food, activity, weight, blood pressure, and more—all in one place. See your most recent data right on the Today home screen. View your glucose hourly trends and dive deeper into your health data in the Journey tab.
   
SET REMINDERS
Set reminders for glucose checks, blood pressure, weigh-ins, medications, exercise, meals, and more. 

CONNECTED DEVICES
One Drop offers direct integration with select Wifi and Bluetooth-enabled devices such as glucose meters, blood pressure monitors, weight scales.  Direct integration with Fitbit activity trackers and Dexcom CGMs are also available. Once you connect a device your readings are automatically sent to the One Drop app.  
 
GOOGLE FIT® INTEGRATION
Sync data from a variety of devices via Google Fit, including: Samsung, LG, Polar, Wahoo, Withings, and more.
 
WORLD'S LARGEST FOOD DATABASE
Search the library or scan barcodes to find foods. Build and save favorite meals for future use. 
 
INTERACTIVE LEARNING EXPERIENCE
Backed by behavioral science, One Drop's interactive learning experience was designed by experts with you in mind. Through engaging health topics, infographics, prompts, commitment pledges, articles, and quizzes, you'll learn everything you need to know to change your habits for good. Personalized plans are available for people with diabetes, prediabetes, high blood pressure, high cholesterol, or any combination. You can also visit the News tab for information on health trends, recipes, and tips on staying healthy.
 
HEALTH FORECASTING AND INSIGHTS
If you have type 2 diabetes, AI-powered technology predicts your future blood sugar levels. For those with high blood pressure, you will receive feedback and insights on your blood pressure trends.  Receiving personalized recommendations and insights gives you the information you need to prevent problems before they happen.
 
-- 
 
MEMBER REVIEWS
 
"Diabetes is so much less stressful with One Drop! Thank you!" —KE
 
"Since starting One Drop, I'm down 22 pounds!"—CB
 
"I'm very excited! My A1C went from 10.7% a little over 4 months ago to 5.7% today!" —CM

details.title: being: self therapy & CBT ai
details.description:
stress. anxiety. social anxiety. depression — we've all experienced issues like these in our lives

but how do we work on them? 

💰 a therapist is expensive
👚 self care tools are often one-size-fits-all
📝 & journaling prompts are usually generic

enter being - the ultimate science-backed, cbt therapy & self care app that meets you where you are 

say goodbye to the stress & anxiety of using random self care/journaling apps,

and say hello to personalized mini-therapies, curated mental wellbeing journeys, guided journal, & 10+ therapy tools

✨ TRUSTED BY 500,000+ people in 140+ countries, and built on 30+ years of research by top therapist(s) ✨

92% users report an improvement in their mental health in 7 days

-

1. HOW DO I USE being?

simply tell us about your mental wellbeing in your words. a few examples:

a. work anxiety is only giving me more stress, i feel stuck
b. i don't want to go out because of social anxiety
c. my partner has panic attacks and i feel bad for not being able to help
d. scrolling social media triggers my anxiety & insecurities
e. don't know if i have depression, but i need help to manage my stress

being offers guided help for 10,000+ issues like this, no matter what you're going through in life, and we add new ones each day

-

2. HOW WILL being HELP ME?

being simplifies self care. 3 things you can do:

💛 mini-therapies —
the most innovative solution to your stress & anxiety yet. a bite-sized interactive session with EMDR & CBT therapy counseling + interactive tools/exercises. each mini-therapy is carefully designed by a therapist to improve your well-being

🧑🏻‍🏫 understand —
our mental health ai (PSY, trained extensively on CBT therapy) will share psycho-educational content to help you understand your issue & instantly alleviate stress. unlike any other online articles (psychologytoday, betterhelp, etc.), PSY is trained to personalize its content for you, just like a therapist would :)

✍🏻 guided journal —
journaling is one of the most effective CBT therapy techniques ever. PSY turns it up a notch, with personalized journaling prompts written just for you

-

3. HOW AFFORDABLE IS being?

super affordable. 

we offer up to 14 days free trial, and if you can't afford being premium, you can choose to pay us whatever you can. 

we're also working on a forever free version of being for you :)

-

4. WHAT'S THE SCIENCE BEHIND being?

a. we've analyzed 1200+ research papers over last 30+ years to break down mental health issues like anxiety, stress & depression into 5000+ scientific issues

b. here are some examples of broken down issues: general anxiety, social anxiety, procrastination, perfectionism, self criticism, self esteem, depression, burnout..

(ps. we do not provide help with issues around trauma or clinically diagnosed disorders. we recommend consulting a therapist for these)

c. we incorporate a holistic combination of therapy techniques to help with your anxiety & stress. for eg:
CBT, 
EMDR,
ACT,
REBT, 
MBT, 
DBT, 
QACP, 
and more! 

d. thought reframing, goal setting, mindfulness, affirmations, visualizations, journaling, breathing, PMR (progressive muscle relaxation) & body scan, are some ways we help you with self care and improving your mental wellbeing

e. we work with 100+ licensed therapist(s) globally to make this possible

-

5. WHY SHOULD I TRUST being?

🧬 we've invested 3+ years & $1.5M to build a self care app deeply rooted in science
🏆 google recognized our contribution by awarding us 'Best App for Good 2021'
🌎 500,000+ people globally trust us to help with their anxiety, stress & depression

-

for any questions or feedback — write to our ceo at varun@being.app

take care. just be :)

details.title: Christian Hypnobirthing
details.description:
Looking to see our app in action? Kathlyn Celeste recently used Christian Hypnobirthing to prepare for her beautiful home water birth! YouTube.com/KathlynCeleste

"With God all things are possible"
(and that includes an amazing birth!)
- Matthew 19:26

Using Christian Hypnobirthing, thousands of women around the world have experienced easier, more relaxed births - some even completely pain-free without any medicated pain relief! This is because the scripture-based audio tracks help condition your mind and body to trust in God, and come into a relaxed, faith-filled state. Being in this state helps the body produce oxytocin (the hormone responsible for an efficient labour) and endorphins (your body's natural pain relief).

The relaxation techniques used in Christian Hypnobirthing can be applied no matter what kind of birth you're having, whether that's an unmedicated physiological birth, a cesarean, or anything in between... If you believe that God is with you throughout your pregnancy, and that birth is a positive and wonderful opportunity to connect with Him and your baby, then that will have a massive impact on your birth experience.

CHRISTIAN HYPNOBIRTHING CAN:

- help you feel more connected to God and your baby during pregnancy and birth
- increase comfort naturally during birth
- decrease stress and fear
- provide comfort and relaxation throughout pregnancy

CAN HYPNOBIRTHING BE CHRISTIAN?

Yes!

There are a lot of misconceptions around what hypnobirthing is (some people worry that it’s a form of mind control or ‘not right with God’ etc - which could not be further from the truth).

Simply put, hypnobirthing brings you into a deeply relaxed state, where you’re able to absorb positive affirmations and beliefs about birth while remaining alert and completely in control. In fact, as a Christian, you’ve probably already experienced being in this relaxed state many times, during prayer or worship activities, etc.

Listening to Christian Hypnobirthing helps to bring you into this calm, faith-filled state, which can help make birth a more relaxing and joyful experience.

THE APP FEATURES:

Over an hour of audio tracks including:
- Breathing and Visualisation exercises
- Encouraging Scriptures for birth
- Positive Affirmations
- Prayers for strength
- Postpartum encouragement

A ‘Positive Birth’ section with links to birth videos, and more.

Blog and Birth Stories

A 50% discount code for our Printable Birth Affirmation Cards.

Download Christian Hypnobirthing and benefit from both the relaxing and calming effects of hypnobirthing, combined with the huge strength, love and support that come from our Heavenly Father, Lord Jesus, and Holy Spirit.

details.title: Simple Seizure Diary
details.description:
This app is the perfect way to keep a diary and read it back in a number of different ways at the click of a button. You can share this information with your doctors and family as well. No login or setup required, just download the app and get started straight away.

NEW: Write notes for your appointments to keep a log of conversations with your doctor. This will also show up in your activity timeline.

You can look at your seizures on a month by month calendar, or scroll up and down through your seizure activity easily in the timeline view. You can share seizure data via e-mail in files that anyone can download and view on their computer, laptop, tablet, or phone.

You can use a wide range of customisable charts as tools to monitor your seizure activity. This is helpful when trying to find patterns or trends in your seizures. These charts are currently available:
- By date
- By length (in minutes)
- By hour of the day (customisable time frames in the settings menu)
- By day of the week
- By preictal symptoms
- By postictal symptoms
- By triggers

You can also add your own seizure types if the default specified do not match your seizure types, and then remove any if you wish to. Similarly, you can add and remove preictal and postictal symptoms, as well as seizure triggers.

I'm adding features regularly so please feel free to send suggestions to the contact email.

details.title: ACOG
details.description:
The American College of Obstetricians and Gynecologists
Ob-Gyns: Download the ACOG app and stay connected with authoritative information from the leading experts in women’s health care. Get valuable tools, resources, and clinical guidelines to help you in your practice.

 • EDD Calculator – Calculate the due date according to guidelines jointly developed by ACOG, AIUM, and SMFM
 • Indicated Delivery (ACOG members only) – Provides members with suggestions related to the timing of delivery based on selected conditions, the patient’s EDD/EGA, and ACOG’s clinical guidance
 • Clinical Consensus, Clinical Practice Guidelines, and Practice Advisories – Get the latest on techniques, clinical management issues, and emerging issues in obstetric and gynecologic practice
 • And more!

details.title: WikEM - Emergency Medicine
details.description:
WikEM, The Global Emergency Medicine Wiki, is a point-of-care reference available on the web or via our dedicated mobile applications. Its emergency medicine knowledge base has thousands of quick problem-specific notes to help you care for patients, which is one of the reasons it has been downloaded by more than 100,000 users and is one of the top 10 most popular emergency medicine websites.  

Supported by the nonprofit OpenEM Foundation, WikEM provides a way for medical practitioners to organize online content and cross-reference clinical information at http://www.wikem.org.  If you are a medical practitioner, join our contributor community and help edit our content.  WikEM is intended for clinicians only and not directly for patients.

WikEM serves a wide range of medical practitioners predominantly among the specialties of emergency medicine, pediatric emergency medicine, critical care, emergency medical services (EMS), and urgent care medicine, as well as primary healthcare fields such as family medicine, internal medicine, and pediatrics.  Numerous sources have named WikEM as a key reference for emergency practitioners, ranging from EMTs, paramedics, and other first responders to nurses, nurse practitioners, physician assistants, and emergency physicians.

details.title: ThoughtFullChat: Mental Health
details.description:
Engage with your mental health and mental wellness with ThoughtFullChat! 

We’re bringing online therapy to you with just a simple tap on your device. Get connected with your best-fit certified mental health therapist (counsellors or psychologists) and chat with them via text or audio message anytime, anywhere. 
  
Your therapist can help you better understand and cope with your thoughts, feelings and behaviours. If all you need is some guidance on your self-care practices and goals, set up a preferred date and time with them for your daily check-ins and bite-sized online coaching for as little as 15 minutes. 

Your mental health needs are our utmost priority. Apart from engaging with a therapist, ThoughtFullChat also provides the following features that allows you to: 

·      Reflect and record how you’re feeling that day using our Mood Tracker 

·      Create a journal or diary entry to note down your thoughts and feelings in our Guided Journal 

·      Track your mental and emotional health with the clinically proven emotional health assessment to help you assess your Stress, Anxiety and Depression at any given time 

·      Access our ThoughtFully curated, science-backed Guided Learning packs to overcome personal (e.g., stress-relief), family, relationship, or career/ academic challenges 

  
Start your day better with ThoughtFullChat, whether it’s simply building everyday resilience or seeking to be more mindful and to grow as an individual. We’re here with you every step of the way. 

ThoughtFullChat is available in 5 languages! (English, Simplified & Traditional Chinese, Bahasa Malaysia, Bahasa Indonesia and Tagalog) 

------- 

ThoughtFullChat also provides Employee Mental Health Assistance Programs, which are tailored to every organization’s needs. Employees under the subscription plan will have access to an on-the-go Employee Assistance Program with unlimited access to all the app’s features. 


Interested to learn more? 

Book a demo with us today, https://www.thoughtfull.world/demo-booking 

------ 

Disclaimer: 
All therapists on ThoughtFullChat are certified mental health professionals (counsellors, psychologists, or psychiatrists) who have completed the required academic and practicum hours to obtain their relevant qualifications and credentials in their respective locations. We have certified coaches in 16 locations who speak over 11 languages and dialects, and cover more than 30 different clinical specialities. We understand that finding the best therapist is sometimes like trying to find THE ONE, you have the option to switch your mental health therapist at any moment. Your progress will be securely and seamlessly transferred to your new therapist. 

 
Subscriptions Disclaimer: 
ThoughtFullChat is a subscription-based app. We do, however, provide a free two-week trial with no credit card details required where you can chat with your online therapist. 

------ 

If you’d like to speak with a therapist via an online therapy session, visit our website for more info, https://www.thoughtfull.world/online-therapy 

If you require any further information, please contact us at hello@thoughtfull.world

Visit our website: www.thoughtfull.world
